displayName: Seat of the Soul in the Crystal

parameters:
The downside here for researcher Albus is that he can't test
the knowledge he has acquired. It's too painful for a
researcher.

Researcher Albus's soul: 'Will you tell me an interesting
story?'

Clea: This is a story that happened in the Fotizona Sea. We
were asked by a certain pirate crew to return a crown...

Researcher Albus's soul: The Lemoss Pirates led by Captain
Carpus, huh! You all must be having a wonderful experience.

Researcher Albus's soul: As someone who can't leave from
here, I envy you all.

Researcher Albus's soul: Now, as for the reward... I will
teach you how to undo the petrification magic of the demon
Guaipezo of Ishigan.

Mage Relm: With this, the petrification curse will be
lifted!

Researcher Albus's soul: If that's the case, I could have
taught you for free. Well, never mind. I'll tell you since
you seem like you'll understand.

Mage Relm: K-Knowledge is flowing into me... It's a very
strange... peculiar sensation, isn't it?

Mage Relm: With these ingredients... I know someone suitable
for the Magic Academy.

Researcher Albus's soul: Gather the materials yourself and
within the range I can teach you, I will cooperate with you.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

Researcher Albus's soul: It seems there is a ship with
skeletal crew members in the Fotizona Sea.

Researcher Albus's soul: Have any requests related to the
sea come to your guild?

Researcher Albus's soul: I'm bored here, so I'm waiting for
an interesting story.

The downside of being a researcher here is that you can't
put the knowledge you've acquired to the test. It's too
painful for a researcher.

Clea: The atmosphere here is different from the places we've
been to before.

Mage Relm: There is no doubt that this is the center that is
creating this space.

Thief Nora: B-But, we still haven't found Albus-san, you
know!?

Priestess Sophia: There were strange things wandering
around. Could it be that they have already perished in this
space--

The soul of the researcher Albus: 'You wonderful seekers
have arrived well with that clue.'

Mage Relm: Albus-san! Dokusa-san is worried, so let's go
together!

The soul of the researcher Albus: This is the final trial.
Show me your skills in defeating the illusions of demons!

Researcher Albus's soul: Oh, sorry, sorry! I just wanted to
play pretend as a cultist possessed by demons!

Researcher Albus's soul: By the way, who are you guys? From
the way you talk, you seem like friends of Dokusa- san.
Clea: Allow me to explain how we ended up here.

The soul of the researcher Albus: 'I see, so it's Dokusa-
san's request. That person is truly diligent and caring,
huh.'
Thief Nora: Relm-san, is something wrong?

Researcher Albus's soul: As expected of my junior from the
academy, you're the only one who has noticed that my
physical body has disappeared.
Priestess Sophia: So, what are we talking about?

Researcher Albus's soul: The crystal I received from Dokusa-
san was a dangerous artifact created by the civilization of
demons.

Researcher Albus's soul: Every time I visited the shrine,
knowledge flowed into me rapidly. The invitation and crystal
that were sent, they are like my conscience, or something
like that.

Researcher Albus's soul: I think I wanted someone to stop
me, but I couldn't resist my desire for research, and ended
up like this.

Researcher Albus's soul: As your senior, let me give you
some advice. If you're also a researcher, you mustn't make a
mistake in knowing when to stop, right?
Mage Relm: My friends stopped me when it was my turn.

Researcher Albus's soul: They're good friends, you should
treasure them.

Researcher Albus's soul: Well, I lost my physical body and
my soul merged with a crystal, gaining knowledge that was
sealed within the crystal.

Researcher Albus's soul: If only the magic power of the
crystal disappears, I will also disappear. Whether it's
today, tomorrow, or a thousand years from now, I don't know.
Thief Nora: D-Don't you want to escape from here?

Researcher Albus's soul: I thought about it and tried to
execute it, but it didn't work. I was stopped by a wandering
minstrel.

Researcher Albus's soul: I have a favor to ask. Please tell
Dokusa-san that I'm sorry for causing them worry.
Mage Relm: Understood, I will definitely convey the message.

Researcher Albus's soul: Come visit occasionally, you have
the qualification to enter here.

Researcher Albus's soul: I'm glad I made various
preparations while I still had a physical body.

Mage Relm: By the way, how do you create an illusion of that
demon!?

Researcher Albus's soul: Hahaha, yeah, I better keep it a
secret from the wandering minstrel.

Researcher Albus's soul: If it's within my capabilities to
teach you, feel free to come visit here whenever you're in
trouble.

Researcher Albus's soul: Place a magic circle right next to
the entrance so that you can come here directly from now on.

Researcher Albus's soul: I apologize for being such an
incompetent assistant to Dokusa-san.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

Hello, have you come because you want to know something
about the researcher Albus?

Clea: Actually, I'm looking for a certain material. I'll
explain the details to you now.

The soul of the researcher Albus... 'The heart of Actina,
the heart of Deire, the eyes of Imiserinos, the heart of
Imiserinos...'

The soul of the researcher Albus... 'Any of them would be
legendary, huh?'

Thief Nora: So, does that mean these legends don't actually
exist?

The soul of the researcher Albus does exist, but there are
some concerns...

Priestess Sophia: Could it be that there is a risk for
Albus-san?

The soul of the researcher Albus... It's scary, but there's
no other way. There's quite a risk for you guys, to be
honest.

The soul of the researcher Albus, 'Do you remember the
illusion of the demon?'

Mage Relm: You're the one who didn't teach me how to do it,
right?

The soul of the researcher Albus: Ahaha, aside from jokes,
that isn't my original creation.

The soul of the researcher Albus: It's a degraded version
that was recreated using modern magic based on something
created in the era of demons.

Priestess Sophia: I can see the story now. In order to
obtain the materials, we need to fight the original
illusion.

Thief Nora: Even though we struggled back then, do we really
need to fight something even stronger!?

The soul of the researcher Albus: To be honest, I don't
really recommend it if you understand the risks.

The soul of the researcher Albus: 'The special material you
are searching for is the power source for the illusions of
demons.'

The soul of the researcher Albus: Well, it's useless to try
and stop you guys with your personalities. I'll tell you the
locations since they're scattered all over, and then...

The soul of the researcher Albus: It's okay now. I've made
it possible to release the magic contained in the shrine.

The soul of the researcher Albus: It's painful to think that
someone might get hurt with the knowledge I taught, so
please be really careful.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

I pray that the bard I told you about won't come because of
what I taught you... He won't come, right?
